slides.title: GPT-5 Family Arrives
slides.key_fact: OpenAI launched its flagship GPT-5 family and first 'open-weight' models, marking a significant expansion in 2025.
slides.visual_description: A futuristic cityscape at night, with glowing neon lines representing data streams flowing from OpenAI's logo. Above the cityscape, a stylized galaxy with prominent stars representing new model families.

slides.title: Pro-Level Scientific AI
slides.key_fact: GPT-5.2 Pro, released Dec 2025, excels in science & math, scoring 93.2% on GPQA Diamond benchmark.
slides.visual_description: A close-up of a complex molecular structure rendered in holographic 3D, glowing against a dark background. Mathematical equations and scientific symbols subtly animate around it. A subtle overlay of the GPQA Diamond benchmark logo.

slides.title: Open Source AI Strategy
slides.key_fact: OpenAI's gpt-oss models (August 2025) offer open-weight AI for data centers and local laptops.
slides.visual_description: Split screen: Left side shows a massive, futuristic data center with glowing server racks. Right side shows a person comfortably using a sleek laptop in a cozy home office environment, with data visualizations on screen.

slides.title: AI Thinks With Images
slides.key_fact: Early 2025's o3 & o4-mini pioneered 'thinking with images,' setting new visual math and science benchmarks.
slides.visual_description: A vibrant, abstract artwork where geometric shapes and mathematical graphs morph seamlessly into visual representations of scientific concepts like DNA strands and celestial bodies. The shapes are fluid and interconnected.

slides.title: Future AI Promises
slides.key_fact: Upcoming 'Garlic' model is in testing, reportedly outperforming Gemini 3 in critical reasoning and coding.
slides.visual_description: A shadowy, almost ethereal figure of a robot or AI interface silhouetted against a bright, abstract digital landscape. Overlayed are fragments of code and complex logic diagrams, pulsing with energy. A faint Google Gemini 3 logo is subtly faded in the background.

caption: OpenAI just dropped a bombshell with GPT-5 family and their first 'open-weight' models! 🤯 Imagine AI that can actually 'think with images' or ace science exams with 93.2% accuracy. What happens when AI becomes truly open and starts outperforming Gemini 3 in critical reasoning?
